content.prompt: What does the shifting tone of Richard’s dialogue in line 24 (“Huh . . . act”) reveal about his character?

choices.label: He is uncertain how he feels when it comes to love.
He is concerned with maintaining others’ opinion of him.
He is sincere in his affection for Muriel.
His emotions can be swayed easily by circumstances.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
